  .sq-btn:active{ transform:translateY(0) scale(.99) }

<style>
  /* Esconde o cart√£o de login assim que houver sess√£o ativa */
  html.logged #login-form { display: none !important; }
</style>
<script>
(function selfQuizSessionize(){
  const BTN_ID = "start-selfquiz-btn";

  // L√™ o SID do login local (login-start grava studentId; remember guarda fs_user)
  function getSID(){
    try{
      const a = (localStorage.getItem('studentId') || '').trim();
      if (a) return a;
      const b = (localStorage.getItem('fs_user') || '').trim();
      if (b) return b;
    }catch(_){}
    return '';
  }

  function updateHref(){
    const btn = document.getElementById(BTN_ID);
    if (!btn) return false;

    const sid = getSID();
    if (!sid) {
      // sem login ‚Üí mant√©m desativado
      btn.setAttribute('href', '#');
      btn.setAttribute('aria-disabled', 'true');
      return false;
    }

    // Ponte de sess√£o no Worker ‚Üí grava cookie e redireciona pro quiz
    const next = '/selfquiz/m/module5';
    const url  = 'https://course-chat.hcmrtns.workers.dev/session/start'
               + '?sid='  + encodeURIComponent(sid)
               + '&next=' + encodeURIComponent(next);

    btn.setAttribute('href', url);
    btn.removeAttribute('aria-disabled');
    // Opcional: marca p√°gina como logada (esconde o card de login)
    document.documentElement.classList.add('logged');
    return true;
  }

  // Tenta j√° no load
  if (updateHref()) return;

  // Reage ao login do seu shim
  document.addEventListener('login:success', updateHref);
  document.addEventListener('auth:login',    updateHref);

  // Fallback: tenta ao DOM pronto
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', updateHref);
})();
</script>
